summary: Imperial Armors, Upgraded!, is a little mod that I made that increases the stats of the Imperial armors including the heavy set, light set, and Pentius Oculatus set.
descriptionHtml:
This small, yet important mod increases that stats of the sub-par Imperial armor sets.

The light armor set's stats have been increased to leather armor stats. The Pentius Oculatus armor set also has the same stats as the latter.

The Heavy Imperial set's stats have been increased to be on-par with the Steel armor set. The Officer's helmet's stats have been increased to be the same as the Dwarven helmet. The Full-faced Imperial helmet's stats have been increased to that of the Steel Plate Helmet.

Also, the stats of the heavy shield have been upped to the steel shield's stats.

Please be sure to rate and leave some feedback! Thanks!
author: NoL1c
